DOC.brief_summary: This study aim provide holistic assessment patient receive etanercept real-world setting .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating The Use Of Etanercept In Patients With Ankylosing Spondylitis
DOC.detailed_description: Non-interventional study : subject select accord usual clinical practice physician
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis ankylose spondylitis ( AS ) Hypersensitivity etanercept Active infection include chronic localised infection Sepsis risk sepsis
